ratings.comment: Yes, the class was easy, but she was an AWFUL teacher. Impossible to stay focused because lectures were incredibly dry. Not to mention that the class was extremely problematic.

Julie is really nice and tries really hard to be helpful and clear. Sometimes class gets a little dry, but it's difficult material to cover. Don't really need to read the course books at all, but do need to cite them for the few course papers. Pretty decent, easy class, with caring teacher.

SW 640 is an extremely easy class. Professor Schuppie is really sweet and knowledgeable. The TAs grade the papers but are not tough graders. The book is really dense but, at least for my class, we didn't really have to read it to succeed. There is no reason not to do well in this class!
